TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509IssuerSerialKeyIdentifierClause extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause

summary.span: Represents a key identifier clause that identifies a security tokens using the distinguished name of the certificate issuer and the X.509 certificate's serial number.

span.span: Represents a key identifier clause that identifies a security tokens using the distinguished name of the certificate issuer and the X.509 certificate's serial number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了在建立自訂安全性權杖服務時，通常並不會使用 。Typically, the is not used, other than when a custom security token service is created. 當安全性權杖服務傳回安全性權杖時，所發出的安全性權杖會包含已附加及未附加之安全性的參考。When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security. 附加的參考會參考包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭中的安全性權杖，而未附加的參考是指不包含在 SOAP 訊息之安全性標頭中的安全性權杖。Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references are security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message. 這些參考通常會證明這些發出之安全性權杖的真實性。These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token. 使用 類別，參考會使用憑證簽發者的辨別名稱以及 X.509 憑證序號的 安全性權杖。Use the class to reference a security token using the distinguished name of the certificate issuer and the X.509 certificate's serial number. 和 屬性分別表示憑證簽發者的辨別名稱以及 X.509 憑證序號。The and properties represent the distinguished name of the certificate issuer and the X.509 certificate's serial number, respectively. [!INCLUDE[vsindigo](~/includes/vsindigo-md.md)] 支援 安全性權杖的下列安全性權杖參考型別。 supports the following types of security token references for security tokens. - - -

summary.span: Gets the distinguished name of the certificate authority that issued the X.509 certificate.

span.span: Gets the distinguished name of the certificate authority that issued the X.509 certificate.

value.span: 核發 X.509 憑證之憑證授權單位的辨別名稱。

span.span: The distinguished name of the certificate authority that issued the X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含核發憑證之憑證授權單位 (CA) 的名稱。The property contains the name of the certificate authority (CA) that issued the certificate. 憑證的辨別名稱是憑證主體或簽發者的文字表示方式。The distinguished name for the certificate is a textual representation of the certificate subject or issuer. 這個表示方式是由 X.500 名稱屬性組成 (例如，"CN=MyName, OU=MyOrgUnit, C=US")。This representation consists of X.500 name attributes (for example, "CN=MyName, OU=MyOrgUnit, C=US").

span.span: Gets the serial number of the X.509 certificate.
The serial number of the X.509 certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 簽發者序號是使用帶正負號的大整數格式。The issuer serial number is in signed large integer format.
